name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open christmas count down”
”Alexa, start christmas count down”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des: A short, simple and fun countdown to Christmas appropriate for all ages. Try saying “Alexa countdown to Christmas“. Also try adding it to your morning routine “start my day” or other routine as appropriate. You’ll hear a fun greeting, the date, how many days until Christmas, then a closing statement and sleigh bells.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
